parameters.query: WITH new_family AS (INSERT INTO families (name, invite_code, is_active) VALUES ('{{ $json.familyName }}', '{{ $json.inviteCode }}', true) RETURNING family_id, name, invite_code), new_user AS (INSERT INTO users (name, family_id, role) SELECT '{{ $json.userName }}', (SELECT family_id FROM new_family), 'admin' RETURNING user_id, name, role) SELECT nf.family_id, nf.name, nf.invite_code, nu.user_id, nu.role FROM new_family nf CROSS JOIN new_user nu
